roleset.name: enhance or increase potency of one agent by another so that the combined effect is greater than the sum of the effects of each one alone
roleset.note: POTENTIATE-V NOTES: (from potentiate.01-v) Extended for Bio AMRs by Bianca and Ulf.

role.descr: Intentional agent, Cause of increased potency
Enhanced by how much, EXT or MNR

example.name: with inanimate Arg2
example.text: These anti-depressants potentiate the analgesic action of opiates.

example.name: with animate Arg0 and instrument
example.text: The doctor potentiated the analgesic action of the opiates with anti-depressants.
example.arg: the analgesic action of the opiates

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: Silencing of CtBP1 increased basal HER3 in 8505C cells and markedly potentiated the effects of PLX4032.

example.name: example with intentional agent
example.text: In addition, we potentiated mechanisms that mediate PTEN membrane association and engineered an enhanced PTEN with increased tumor suppressor functions.
example.arg: mechanisms that mediate PTEN membrane association
